code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import reducers from'./reducers';import sagas from'./sagas';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware];export function configureStore(initialState){var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));sagaMiddleware.run(sagas);if(module.hot){module.hot.accept('./reducers',function(){var nextRootReducer=require('./reducers');store.replaceReducer(nextRootReducer);});}return store;}
